javadoc:
Interface for bookmarks.  Bookmarks are locations that are marked within the program so
 that they can be easily found.

methods.javadoc: Returns the id of the bookmark.
methods.name: getId
methods.comment: Returns the id of the bookmark.

methods.javadoc: Returns address at which this bookmark is applied.
methods.name: getAddress
methods.comment: Returns address at which this bookmark is applied.

methods.javadoc: Returns bookmark type as a string
methods.name: getTypeString
methods.comment: Returns bookmark type as a string

methods.name: set
methods.comment: Set the category and comment associated with a bookmark.

name: Bookmark
comment:
Interface for bookmarks.  Bookmarks are locations that are marked within the program so
 that they can be easily found.
